## Diagram

![Transfer function diagram](transferFunction.svg){#fig-transferfunction}

::: {#fig-transferfunction}
Transfer function control block diagram
:::

Syntax:  

- function name: tf1p
- input variable : $x_i$
- output variable : $x_j$
- data name, parameter name or math expression for $G$
- data name, parameter name or math expression for $T$

Internal states : none

Discrete variable : none

## Equations

$$ T \dot{x_j} = - x_j + G x_i$$

**N.B.** A zero value for $T$ is allowed.
